examples: What do you need help with?: i want to register type team please tell me about it
How can we help you?: I don't remember what account I registered with
What do you need help with? : Registered with the wrong email address

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’m having a major issue with Canva. Your customer service has been completely ridiculous and NOT helpful. This is my 4th attempt to fix this situation. I’ve reached out though email, through Instagram. FIX THIS. I’ve been paying for Canva PRO for months I’ve never had an issue. A few weeks ago my account was logged out. I tried to log back in with my Apple ID which I initially logged in and registered with. I received a notification my email wasn’t registered. I tried all my possible emails- none were registered. I reached out Apple for a refund because I never heard back from Canva. I use your app for work everyday and it’s been really frustrating. Please help.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I can't register for canva lite
What do you need help with ?: there is no more email registered
How can we help you ?: I don't remember my email registered in this account

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I used an incorrect email address when I registered AND I do not know my account password.

Quel problème rencontrez-vous ?: Hi ! 
I upgraded to a pro account tuesday but it seems that my account didnt register it.

Please help !
What do you need help with ?: I don't know what email I registered with the pro
How can we help you ?: I want to know if I am already registered in this app
What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: please do not register my account

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My Canvas Pro that I’m paying for doesn’t register on my account. I’m taking to someone thru FB messenger.
What do you need help with?: when I log in with my email in my phone, it tells me my email is not registered. Recently I bought the PRO version.

What do you need help with?: We have another account with Canva Pro that is being paid for through automatic payments to a credit card.  We do not know what  email address was used to register this account and do not have user id or password.  We want to be able to log into this account.  How can I get help on this?  I opened this free account just to be able to access the help as I cannot find a number to call you
What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Never registered and been done through Wind Security ?????
What do you need help with ?: I have a pro account, but my colleagues that I have registered are not notified. I also don't receive a confirmation email when I click on the link
What do you need help with ?: I have an account but I don't remember the registered email and it's already being discounted on my card
What do you need help with?: I did not register for this. Someone else is using my email. Please unsuscribe. I will not pay this registration as I am not the person who have registered.
What do you need help with?: Dear., I'm a member of Canva. I remember that I register 1 package but i don't know which one. Would you please tell me about my package? Many thank <NAME>

What do you need help with ?: I registered with the pro and they said that in order to affect and collect I would need to accept it. on 12/30 they sent me an email saying they were going to start charging, I couldn't answer, just today. and they already discounted me. however, I don't want the service.

Describe your issue: It says that I am already registered for Canva Pro under my email, <EMAIL> but I do not remember signing up for this. I now want to start a free trial and subscribe but I cannot. Thank you! - Emily
